html: Today in #Maine I outlined a five-point plan to help farmers mitigate climate change: Prioritize soil health initiatives Protect farmland and improve farm viability Support pasture-based livestock systems Invest in on-farm and rural energy initiatives Reduce food wastepic.twitter.com/keslzrxVmZ
text:
Today in #Maine I outlined a five-point plan to help farmers mitigate climate change: 
Prioritize soil health initiatives
Protect farmland and improve farm viability
Support pasture-based livestock systems
Invest in on-farm and rural energy initiatives
Reduce food wastepic.twitter.com/keslzrxVmZ

html: The full report should be released to the public without redaction and Mr. #Mueller should testify before Congress about his findings.
text: The full report should be released to the public without redaction and Mr. #Mueller should testify before Congress about his findings.

html: Even now, we still have not seen #Mueller's complete findings. The abridged version we received is no substitute for the unvarnished truth, especially given the indisputable fact that Russia hacked our election.
text: Even now, we still have not seen #Mueller's complete findings. The abridged version we received is no substitute for the unvarnished truth, especially given the indisputable fact that Russia hacked our election.

html: Today’s press conference by Mr. Barr was an exercise in political spin. The AG must be loyal to the rule of law, not the executive. Pres. Trump's lawyers saw the findings of #Mueller's investigation before the U.S. Congress and before the American people. That is not acceptable.

html: Though the Equal Pay Act was signed into law more than 50 years ago, the gender pay gap still persists. In 2017 for every dollar a man in #Maine made, a woman in Maine earned only 82 cents. text:
Proud to cosponsor #PaycheckFairnessAct + vote this week for #HR7 in order to:
Create a negotiation skills training program for women and girls
Protect against retaliation for discussing salaries
Prohibit employers from screening job applicants based on salary historypic.twitter.com/w15S4vQKSz

html: https://www.pressherald.com/?p=1886262  I join my colleagues in demanding that Attorney General Barr release the full report of Special Counsel Robert Mueller to the American public. The nation deserves to know the contents of the full report and its underlying documentations and findings.
text:
https://www.pressherald.com/?p=1886262 
I join my colleagues in demanding that Attorney General Barr release the full report of Special Counsel Robert Mueller to the American public. The nation deserves to know the contents of the full report and its underlying documentations and findings.

html: The #SavetheInternet Act empowers the @FCC to prohibit unjust, unreasonable and discriminatory practices and enacts the legacy #netneutrality principles: no blocking no throttling no paid prioritization Read the bill I've co-sponsored: https://bit.ly/2TmiGhR pic.twitter.com/jDCpofP9qM
text:
The #SavetheInternet Act empowers the @FCC to prohibit unjust, unreasonable and discriminatory practices and enacts the  legacy #netneutrality principles:
 no blocking
 no throttling
 no paid prioritization 
Read the bill I've co-sponsored: https://bit.ly/2TmiGhR pic.twitter.com/jDCpofP9qM

html: As shootings have rocked our nation, I’ve met w/ students who don’t feel safe in schools, parents who fear for their children, & heartbroken families who’ve lost their loved ones to #gunviolence. Congress should be ashamed that we've ignored this crisis for so long. We need #HR8!
text: As shootings have rocked our nation, I’ve met w/ students who don’t feel safe in schools, parents who fear for their children, & heartbroken families who’ve lost their loved ones to #gunviolence. Congress should be ashamed that we've ignored this crisis for so long. We need #HR8!

html: Americans are 25 times more likely to be killed by a gun than people in other developed countries. That is unacceptable. Right now the House is taking historic action to #EndGunViolence by passing #HR8.

html: For 7 out of 10 Mainers who rely on #TitleX providers it is their only source of health care. #TItleX provides access to: birth control cancer screenings STI testing/treatment regular check-ups. These basic services are now in jeopardy. I will fight this in Congress!
text:
For 7 out of 10 Mainers who rely on #TitleX providers it is their only source of health care. #TItleX provides access to:
birth control
cancer screenings
STI testing/treatment
regular check-ups.
These basic services are now in jeopardy. I will fight this in Congress!

html: In our last few conversations @RepWalterJones lamented the negative changes he felt were undermining our Congress. I was so sorry to hear that he was ill and of his passing. I will truly miss my very dear colleague — we didn’t have to agree on every topic to value each other.
text: In our last few conversations @RepWalterJones lamented the negative changes he felt were undermining our Congress. I was so sorry to hear that he was ill and of his passing. I will truly miss my very dear colleague — we didn’t have to agree on every topic to value each other.

html: .@RepWalterJones was a Republican co-sponsor of my first bill to allow public financing of campaigns and we co-sponsored many other bipartisan bills together over the years. He was not afraid to disagree with and stand up GOP leadership.
text: .@RepWalterJones was a Republican co-sponsor of my first bill to allow public financing of campaigns and we co-sponsored many other bipartisan bills together over the years. He was not afraid to disagree with and stand up GOP leadership.

html: I'll miss @RepWalterJones. He was incredibly kind man who reflected on how his work in Congress impacted others. I admired how he came to oppose the war in Iraq and wrote 12,000 letters to the families of fallen service members.

html: I urge President Trump to put the American people first and end his shutdown now.
text: I urge President Trump to put the American people first and end his shutdown now.

html: Last week, House Democrats gave the Senate and President Trump what they need to reopen the government—passing a spending package with significant bipartisan consensus —and make way for a meaningful debate on immigration. This week we are doing it again.
text: Last week, House Democrats gave the Senate and President Trump what they need to reopen the government—passing a spending package with significant bipartisan consensus —and make way for a meaningful debate on immigration. This week we are doing it again.

html: We have 800,000 federal workers worried about making ends meet, families wondering whether they will get help next month to put food on the table, and an American public losing faith in whether their government will be open for business on any given day.
text: We have 800,000 federal workers worried about making ends meet, families wondering whether they will get help next month to put food on the table, and an American public losing faith in whether their government will be open for business on any given day.

html: The real crisis we need to address is one of President Trump’s own making—a government shutdown that has now finished its 18th day.
text: The real crisis we need to address is one of President Trump’s own making—a government shutdown that has now finished its 18th day.

html: “The Wall” only serves to divide us and distract us from the important discussions we need to have about immigration reform, the treatment of those seeking asylum in our great country, and the best way to allocate resources to secure our nation from within and without.
text: “The Wall” only serves to divide us and distract us from the important discussions we need to have about immigration reform, the treatment of those seeking asylum in our great country, and the best way to allocate resources to secure our nation from within and without.

html: Nothing President Trump said tonight demonstrates that this wall is anything more than a monument to himself.
text: Nothing President Trump said tonight demonstrates that this wall is anything more than a monument to himself.

text:
I'm proud to cosponsor HR 1 #ForThePeople Act to put political power back where it should be—in the people’s hands.  
 
Too many in this nation feel that their voices in this democracy are being drowned out. It’s time to set things right #mepoliticspic.twitter.com/p4ynvmF1SK

html: Just to be clear, the funding bills we passed last night would: 1. Reopen the government 2. Keep these unjust raises from happening and 3. Instate a 1.9% COLA to all other federal employees (who've more than earned it) #mepolitics
text:
Just to be clear, the funding bills we passed last night would: 

1. Reopen the government 
2. Keep these unjust raises from happening and 
3. Instate a 1.9% COLA to all other federal employees (who've more than earned it)

#mepolitics

html: I hope the Trump administration will work with Congress to address these significant issues in the President's #NAFTA plan and support American workers, as he’s long promised to do.
text: I hope the Trump administration will work with Congress to address these significant issues in the President's #NAFTA plan and support American workers, as he’s long promised to do.

html: I'm disappointed to see more sweeteners for big Pharma in President Trump’s #NAFTA deal. At a time when drug companies are raising prices & making record profits after receiving a multi-billion $$ tax cut, this deal inexplicably extends market exclusivity for drug companies.
text: I'm disappointed to see more sweeteners for big Pharma in President Trump’s #NAFTA deal. At a time when drug companies are raising prices & making record profits after receiving a multi-billion $$ tax cut, this deal inexplicably extends market exclusivity for drug companies.

html: It’s outrageous that one week after 13 federal agencies issued a report warning of the dire effects of #climatechange, President Trump's #NAFTA plan doesn’t even mention efforts to reduce greenhouse gases, hold polluters accountable or invest in renewable energy.
text: It’s outrageous that one week after 13 federal agencies issued a report warning of the dire effects of #climatechange, President Trump's #NAFTA plan doesn’t even mention efforts to reduce greenhouse gases, hold polluters accountable or invest in renewable energy.

html: If President Trump’s #NAFTA plan does not include penalties for outsourcing, corporations will continue to send jobs to Mexico, pay those workers poverty wages and flood our market with cheaply-produced goods made elsewhere.
text: If President Trump’s #NAFTA plan does not include penalties for outsourcing, corporations will continue to send jobs to Mexico, pay those workers poverty wages and flood our market with cheaply-produced goods made elsewhere.

html: When President Trump first announced his intent to renegotiate #NAFTA, I was hopeful that we could get a better deal for American workers. Sadly, once again, he has overpromised. His NAFTA 2.0 plan does nothing to enforce or improve labor standards.

html: I agree #NAFTA needs improvement but the Trump Admin’s proposal isn’t it. We must: Increase wages Prevent employers from moving jobs overseas Protect human rights Reverse damage done by corporate polluters I'll continue to push for a better deal for Mainers. #mepolitics
text:
I agree #NAFTA needs improvement but the Trump Admin’s proposal isn’t it. 
We must:
Increase wages
Prevent employers from moving jobs overseas
Protect human rights
Reverse damage done by corporate polluters
I'll continue to push for a better deal for Mainers.
#mepolitics

html: It was not always easy. Failure and sacrifice went part and parcel with the national journey. Democracy is messy work. Much has been expected of every generation and we are no exception. Maintaining what we have will take more work.

html: Wherever you are tomorrow I hope you celebrate, because the enduring survival of a democratic experiment over 242 years is a great event. But while you are relaxing, remember for at least a moment the care, the work, the tears, and the toil that has gone into that preservation.

html: Stopping family separation is a good first step, but how is the Trump Administration working on reunifying these families? It’s wrong to give parents the false choice of dropping their asylum claims to see their children. #FamiliesBelongTogether
text:
Stopping family separation is a good first step, but how is the Trump Administration working on reunifying these families? 

It’s wrong to give parents the false choice of dropping their asylum claims to see their children. #FamiliesBelongTogether
